p: Orf1a gene is expressed early and translated into a polyprotein that will be cleaved into 11 non-structural proteins (Nsp1-11) by the papain-like activity of Nsp3 [ 12] or by Nsp5, which possess a chymotrypsin-like protease activity [ 13]. Orf1ab is in a different frame from Orf1a and the virus uses programmed-1 ribosomal frameshifting (-1 PRF) to synthesize it.
